hello: Hello! I'm a chatbot who gets GitHub information, type 'help' if you need some assistance. Click on the button below to visit my repository.
sorry: Sorry, I did not understand '%s'. Type 'help' if you need assistance.
stars_error: Please provide a repository in the format user/repository.
repository_info_response: The repository %s uses the language %s, it has %d stars, %d forks and %d watchers.
repository_info_error: Please provide a repository in the format user/repository.
user_info_response: The user %s is named %s, follow %d users, has %d followers and %d repositories.
trending_consulting: Getting trending repositories of %s of %s on GitHub...
trending_info_response: The repository %s uses the language %s, it has %d stars, %d forks, and it has got %d new stars.
thanks: If you need more informations, just talk to me again :)
help:
I'm a chatbot who gets GitHub information, with me you can:

• Get repositories informations, such as star and fork number - **Example:** show me the vuejs/vue reposity **/** repo laravel/laravel

• Get user informations, such as follower and following number. - **Example:** show me the alefesouza profile **/** user alefesouza

• Get only the number of stars of a repository - **Example:** How many stars have the facebook/react repo? **/** microsoft/vscode stars

• Show a list of trending repositories by programming language and time. - **Example:** Show me the trending JavaScript repositories this month. **/** trendings
about:
This is an open source project by Alefe Souza, created as the final project for the Maratona Bots (Bots Marathon), a free online course from Microsoft, you can check the source code on https://github.com/alefesouza/github-chatbot



**Acknowledgments**



To all Maratona Bots instructors, probably without them this project wouldn't be possible:



• André Luiz Secco

• Angelo Belchior

• Cynthia Zanoni

• Jucinei Pereira dos Santos

• Vitor Pereira
